name: TheAtlantic
text:
Stanford University has announced that it will drop 11 varsity sports, including fencing, sailing and squash.

Athletics at elite colleges "are a quiet sort of affirmative action for affluent white kids," Saahil Desai argued in 2018: https://t.co/Zt0RpSNmlV

name: TheAtlantic
text: Earth at night is a navy-blue marble with a dusting of gold, the electric sparks of modern life. When the pandemic arrived, researchers started seeing intriguing changes in the glow, @marinakoren reports: https://t.co/drsoBtj87T

name: TheAtlantic
text: "I always feel like I'm never doing enough." America's public-health experts are tired, drained, and frustrated about shouting advice into a political void, @edyong209 reports. https://t.co/PBkFtmnozH

name: TheAtlantic
text: "The backlash against a successful government program is why the U.S. canâ€™t have nice things." @GrahamDavidA looks at criticism of the Paycheck Protection Program: https://t.co/a7dcuCbYAl
